--- ascal_elessar <ascal_elessar@...> wrote:

> I was wondering if anyone here could recommend some
> books on samurai 
> history. I've only just developed an interest in
> this subject and am 
> looking for a book which can give my a general
> background. Are there 
> any particular books or authors that you would
> recommend? 
> 
> Thank you, in advance, for your help.

Where to begin? I'd start with
www.samurai-archives.com, and go to the recommended
reading page. All the books I'd recommend off the top
of my head are there, plus a lot more.
